sentences.en: "How many do you want?" — "I'll have a pound's worth."
sentences.cn: “你要多少?”“我要1英镑的.”

sentences.en: a chance to win £2,000 worth of computing equipment
sentences.cn: 一次赢取价值2,000英镑的电脑设备的机会

sentences.en: A thousand pounds worth of jewellery and silver has been stolen.
sentences.cn: 价值1,000英镑的珠宝和银饰被盗。

sentences.en: Any coach worth his salt would do exactly as I did.
sentences.cn: 任何称职的教练都会采取和我一模一样的行动。

sentences.en: British Aerospace has won an order worth 340 million dollars.
sentences.cn: 英国宇航公司已经赢得了3.4亿美元的订单。

sentences.en: By the time he's twenty he'll know everyone worth knowing in Washington.
sentences.cn: 到20岁时，他就会认识华盛顿所有值得认识的人。

sentences.en: Customers are told what their policies will be worth on maturity.
sentences.cn: 客户被告知保险单到期时的价值。

sentences.en: for what it's worth, she's very highly thought of abroad.
sentences.cn: 不论真假，海外都很看重她。

sentences.en: he thumps the drums for all he's worth.
sentences.cn: 他拼命地击鼓。

sentences.en: Here's my advice, for what it's worth.
sentences.cn: 这是我的建议，尽管可能用处不大，你姑且听听

sentences.en: His mother inherited a farm worth 15,000 dollars a year.
sentences.cn: 他母亲继承了一处年产值为1.5万美元的农场。

sentences.en: It is worth pausing to consider these statements from Mr Davies.
sentences.cn: 戴维斯先生的这番话值得大家停下来思考一下。

sentences.en: it requires a bit of patience to learn, but it's well worth it.
sentences.cn: 学习需要一点耐心，但完全值得付出。

sentences.en: it requires a bit of patience to learn, but it's well worth it.
sentences.cn: 学习需要一点耐心，但完全值得付出。

sentences.en: it requires a bit of patience to learn, but it's well worth it.
sentences.cn: 学习需要一点耐心，但完全值得付出。

sentences.en: It was a lot of hard work, but it was worth it .
sentences.cn: 虽然非常辛苦，但是值得。

sentences.en: It was a lot of hard work, but it was worth it .
sentences.cn: 虽然非常辛苦，但是值得。

sentences.en: Last year 400,000 acres of land yielded a crop worth $1.75 billion.
sentences.cn: 去年40万英亩的土地产值达17.5亿美元。

sentences.en: One of the pictures is worth £50,000.
sentences.cn: 其中一幅画值5万英镑。

sentences.en: Our house is worth £200 000.
sentences.cn: 攀登到山顶要很长时间，但为了能看到山顶上的风景，这是值得的。

sentences.en: Our house is worth about £100 000.
sentences.cn: 我们的房子价值约20万英镑。

sentences.en: Remember – you are worth not for what you have, not even for who you are, but for what others are because of you.
sentences.cn: 记住：你的价值不在于你拥有什么，甚至不在于你是谁，而在于因为你（的影响），别人成了怎样的人！

sentences.en: She needs to regain a sense of her own worth.
sentences.cn: 她需要重新认识到自我的价值。

sentences.en: The baroque church of San Leonardo is worth a quick look.
sentences.cn: 圣莱昂纳多的巴洛克式教堂值得一看。

sentences.en: The directors of this company feel he's worth every penny.
sentences.cn: 这家公司的主管们觉得他值得栽培。

sentences.en: The fire caused thousands of pounds’ worth of damage.
sentences.cn: 火灾造成了数千英镑的损失。

sentences.en: The new computer system has already proved its worth.
sentences.cn: 新的计算机系统已经证明了它的价值。

sentences.en: The team would have need of a driver of his worth.
sentences.cn: 这支队伍需要一位他这样技术水平的司机。

sentences.en: The worth of our lives comes, not in what we do or who we know, but by WHO WE ARE.
sentences.cn: 我们生活的价值不在于我们做了什么，或者我们认识谁，生活的价值在于我们是谁。

sentences.en: the youths milked him for all he was worth and then disappeared.
sentences.cn: 年轻人榨干了他的所有，然后消失了。

sentences.en: They had shoplifted thousands of dollars' worth of merchandise.
sentences.cn: 他们已经偷了商店价值好几千美元的商品。

sentences.en: Traditional Spanish food is delicious and its specialities are worth searching out.
sentences.cn: 传统的西班牙食品美味可口，其特色菜肴值得寻访。

sentences.en: You should not deprecate your own worth.
sentences.cn: 你不应该贬低你自己的价值。

words.tran_cn: 无价值的；不值钱的；卑微的
值得的；有价值的；配得上的，相称的；可尊敬的；应…的

phrases.tran_cn: 尽全力：至某人力量或能力的极限

phrases.phrase: for all someone is worth informal 非正式

phrases.tran_cn: 不论好坏：即使可能不重要或价值不大
(非正式)值得的；值得麻烦的；值得花钱的

trans.tran_cn: 价值，值…钱，值得，拥有…价值的财产
trans.tran_en: having a value in money, etc.
an amount of something worth ten pounds, $500 etc
used to say that you gain something from an action
